thread.title: Sierra Pacific worker dies in logging accident
thread.title_full: Sierra Pacific worker dies in logging accident

title: Sierra Pacific worker dies in logging accident
text: Sierra Pacific worker dies in logging accident Sierra Pacific worker dies in logging accident By Union Democrat staff October 16, 2015 09:42 am A Sierra Pacific Industries truck driver died Thursday as logs were being unloaded, said Mike Pawlicki, a company spokesman. The accident occurred in the forest near Georgetown, said Pawlicki. “It’s a terrible tragedy and our condolences go to the family,” said Pawlicki. The worker’s identity was not released. Georgetown is about 90 miles north of Sonora. The accident is still under investigation by the company, Pawlicki said. Follow UnionDemocrat.com
